titles.title: So I run, yes, I run, to Your mercy seat

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
So I run, yes, I run, to Your mercy seat
And I throw myself down at Your merciful feet,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Where the river of life flows,
Where rest is found for my weary soul;
My strength is renewed as the eagle's
And salvation is joyful again.
